Title: Ed Wunclers - Mirana hard carry [pro arrow build]

ItemTooltips.branches: Either branch or Wraith Band recipe.
ItemTooltips.power_treads: Use agility when last hitting in the lane and switch to strength as soon as shit is about to go down with a enemy hero.
ItemTooltips.wraith_band: Either buy 2 branches for last 150g or Wraith Band recipe, then you are able to buy Aquila form sideshop.
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: Get if going against a lot of stuns etc.
ItemTooltips.sphere: Get if going against a lot of nuke, lion, lina, nyx etc.
ItemTooltips.butterfly: If more survivability is needed go Butterfly instead of Daedalus.
ItemTooltips.greater_crit:
Get if more dmg is needed.

If survivability is needed go butterfly.
ItemTooltips.manta: Get after Diffusal Blade or Desolator for survivability.
ItemTooltips.desolator: Get if going against str heros.
ItemTooltips.diffusal_blade: Get if going against int heros.
ItemTooltips.ring_of_aquila: Get last parts from side shop. Or buy parts from base if you dont have Wraith Band recipe.
